<La Trayectoria
1:
--------------------
Text: La Trayectoria (Gloria Trevi album):  The DVD includes scenes from parts of the tour from the Palacio de los Deportes of the Mexico City and The Arena Monterrey and the CD includes four new songs like: "Todos Me Miran" (They All Look At Me) is the first single compilation study of Mexican singer "Gloria Trevi", this is an unreleased song from the album.
